page.title: 13SERVICES
page.content: THE LOCAL DOCTOR FOR MOST PEOPLE IS BASED AT NEWPORT PAGNELL, FOR OTHERS AT OLNEY.THE MAIN DENTIST IS ALSO AT NEWPORT AND THE MAIN HOSPITAL IS AT EAGLESTONE IN MILTON KEYNES,ONLY VERY RECENTLY OPENED, SO PREVIOUSLY NORTH- AMPTON OR AYLESBURY.ALL BUILDERS,PLUM- BERS AND OTHER SUCH SERVICES ARE PROV- IDED BY NEWPORT,SHERINGTON,OLNEY etc. FIRMS.SHOPPING IS DONE ON A LOCAL BASIS AT OLNEY AND NEWPORT OR FURTHER AFIELD AT MILTON KEYNES,NORTHAMPTON, WESTON FAVELL etc.MANY PEOPLE OBTAIN GOODS THROUGH MAIL ORDER CATALOGUES.THE 3 VILLAGES HAVE NO GAS SUPPLY BUT ELECT- RICITY IS SUPPLIED BY THE EAST MIDLANDS ELECTRICITY BOARD AND WATER/SEWAGE IS THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE ANGLIAN WATER AUTHORITY.MOST HOMES HAVE PHONES (BRIT- ISH TELECOM).RATES ARE PAID TO MILTON KEYNES BOROUGH COUNCIL WHICH REPLACED NEPORT PAGNELL RURAL DISTRICT COUNCIL.
